name: Cinematic Universal Roleplaying Engine (CURE)
description:
CURE (or the Cinematic Universal Roleplaying Engine) is a short, simple, set of cinematic rules that I've used to run home games in a number of settings over the past four years or so, adding to and refining the rules as playtesting has proceeded. 

I now feel confident enough to release the current iteration of the rules to the public for outside testing (so, please, test them out and let me know what you felt works and what doesn't).
